You are going to
payment reference number
1, your remittance will go directly to the seller\'s account, and the digital assets sold by the seller during the transaction will be protected by the platform. 2, please complete the payment within the specified time, and be sure to click "I have paid", after the seller confirms the payment, the system will transfer the digital assets to your account.
3, if the buyer cancels the order 3 times on the same day, it will be restricted to the buy function of the day
1, the digital assets you sell have been frozen by the platform hosting. Please confirm that you have received the payment from the other party and click on "I have received payment" to pay for the digital asset!
2, please do not believe any reason to urge the release of the currency, confirm the receipt of the money and then release the digital assets to avoid losses!
3, after receiving the SMS, please be sure to log in to online banking or mobile banking to confirm whether the payment is credited, to avoid the release of digital assets due to fraudulent SMS messages!

secure verification
Google Authenticator is a dynamic password tool that works like SMS dynamic verification. A dynamic verification code is generated every 30s after binding, and the verification code can be used for security verification of operations such as login and withdrawal.
Android users log in to the app store or use the mobile browser to search for "Google Authenticator" downloads.
Open Google Authenticator, scan the QR code below or manually enter the following key to add a verification token.
Key is used to retrieve Google Authenticator when the phone is replaced or lost. Please make sure to save the following key backup before binding.
Download Google Authenticator APP
Add a key in Google Authenticator and back up
Enter the 6-digit verification code in Google Authenticator
